TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION:
This lookup was added for ITPR002957 FEP 2012 for Rebates. Modified 5/7/2012 for project ITRP000634.
This expression will evaluate the response from the LKP_RCIT_PMCY_NTWK results and possibly change the BCA SPCL_DRUG_CD value being written out.
If the lookup returns a SPCL_DRUG_CD then that means this claims RBAT_ID/PHCY_NTWK_ID/DSPN_DT (range) was found in the RCIT_PMCY_NTWK table, and therefore the BCA SPCL_DRUG_CD value needs to be overridden to the value returned. Otherwise, if the rebate id is found on the table and the FEP_CNTL_CD is 1, override the value with a 0, else use the input specialty drug code.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_Evaluate_PMCY_NTWK_ID

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This input only port is from the EXP_CLAIM expression, and can possibly be overridden for the BCA target field.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: in_SPCL_DRUG_CD

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This output only port will evaluate the lkp_SPCL_DRUG_CD, and when it is NULL, will assign the in_SPCL_DRUG_CD value. If the lkp_SPCL_DRUG_CD is NOT null, then that means that the lookup value from the LKP_RCIT_SPCL_NTWK field SPCL_DRUG_CD will be used for the BCA target.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: out_SPCL_DRUG_CD
